home.subtitle: Frontend Developer
home.description: I'm a frontend developer, with experience working on projects that need to be reliable, scalable and responsive. Open to work.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: I am open to new opportunities, both for long periods and for PJ / freelance contracts. Get in touch using the button below and let's develop something together!

about.description:
Systems developer with more than 5 years of experience in large scale projects. Great experience with responsive development, mobile development, creation and integration of API`s, automated tests (unit, integration, e2e). 

Knowledge in:

- Programming Languages: Javascript, TypeScript, C#
- Frontend: HTML, CSS, SCSS, React, React Native, VueJS, Angular 2+, Redux, Styled Components, Storybook
- Backend: NodeJS, .NET Core, SQL Server, MongoDB, Oracle, TypeORM, EF
- Test: Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress

projects.description: A small gallery with some projects that I enjoyed developing. Through my Github you will be able to go deeper into the stacks and technologies that I am aware of.

contactForm.title: Write me
contactForm.name: Name
contactForm.messagePlaceholder: We like your work and we want you on our team

name.length: Field name must be between 2 and 100 characters

submitted.title: Message sent
submitted.description: Hello {{name}}, I received your message and will reply as soon as possible
